4.name: Little Rock
4.description: A rock. Can't be more obvious. Increases underwater jump height.

5.name: Big Rock
5.description: A large rock that is very big. Hold the down button to increase fall speed

6.name: Diving Gear
6.description: Not to be confused with dining gear. Extends breath underwater.

7.name: Skeleton Necklace
7.description: Pulsing with some kind of ancient energy. Or delusion. Occasionally hurts nearby enemies.

8.name: The Skeleton King's Hand
8.description: Reminds me of my ex-wife. Lifesteal on hit.

9.name: Cross
9.description: The power of nondescript higher power compells you! Does more damage to undead monsters.

10.name: A Sopping Wet Copy of Moby Dick
10.description: It's like the real thing. Does more damage to fish monsters.

11.name: Can O' Spinach
11.description: A media tie-in deal with the hit 2005 videogame featuring a particular strongarm sailor. Increase to health

14.name: 4-Leaf Clover
14.description: Whoa! The tell-tale sign of increased luck.

15.name: CD: Daquri Town
15.description: James Allyoucaneat's hit 1977 song. Wait, it's that old?

16.name: CD: Hamburger In Wonderland
16.description: James Allyoucaneat's back at it again! This time, he's brought his frycook friend.

17.name: CD: Brother of a Brother of a Sailor
17.description: The title track off of James Allyoucaneat's 1978 album. It's familiar, but not too familiar. But, not too not-familiar either.

18.name: CD: It's Six'O Clock Somewhere
18.description: Written by a moose. Performed by a man with a parrot for a head. Released in 2003.

19.name: Boat Color: Blue
19.description: Written by a moose. Performed by a man with a parrot for a head. Released in 2003.
